name: A Jelly Upon the Deep
description:
You are alone in the depths of the ocean. The other jellies have returned to their home without you! Make your way down to find your family, but beware of the dangers you will find in these waters. The further you go, the closer you get to the Kraken's territory. But that's just a myth... right?

Made for Ludum Dare 48! 

Controls:

Left/Right : W/D, <-/->, or Left joystick.

Gold coins will make you sink faster. Bubbles will make you sink slower, and if you collect enough you can even start moving back up. 

Boss Fight Spoilers:

Once you have awakened the Kraken, it will follow you until either you or it dies. Use the bubbles and coins to change your downward velocity. The Kraken can be killed by pushing the green "poison" blocks into its open eye. Good luck!

Credits:

All coding, pixel art, and sounds are done by me: 0hSlash. 0hSlash on Twitter.

The pallet I used is called Bubblegum 16 by PineappleOnPizza. You can find it here: Link

Music was created by me using BeepBox. Sounds were generated using SFXR.
